Posts.Title: 2 years after chemo, my hair has not grown back

Posts.Content: Hi, it has been frustrating for me to wait for my hair to look "normal " again and I realize now that after 3 years it is going to stay thin, wispy and fuzzy. I tried everything and I mean everything. So this is where I am now with it. I bought tape in extensions which are much cheaper then the sew in kind and they last longer. My hair now looks like it used to and even though my hair is very thin on top my hairdresser has worked it so I feel back to normal , as much as possible. I hope this helps with the women who are having hair problems. Btw you can wash, blow dry and straighten with an iron if you want. I actually forget it's not my hair. Good luck!
